{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = Prism GT 802.11b/g Adapter |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none -->
|brand = Senao |model = NL-3054 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = UB5 |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |wlclass = G54 |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = USB |if_bus_version = 2.0 |ifconnector = <!-- Interface Connector Type, Leave blank for none --> |formfactor = corded (modular) adapter
|vendor_id = 09aa |device_id = 1000 |subvendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subdevice_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = <!-- OUI -->
|chip1 = Intersil;ISL3880; |chip2 = Intersil;ISL3686A; |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = U.FL |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11b/g |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |wififreq = 2.4 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->
|linuxdriv = |windriv =

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan

}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== USB ID gleaned from [http://forum.aircrack-ng.org/index.php?topic=2352;prev_next=next this post].
Device also known as the [[Senao SL-3054UB5]].
*[https://deviwiki.com/files/datasheets/senao/SL-3054UB5.pdf Datasheet], [http://www.movistar.es/on/io/es/atencion/soporte_tecnico_y_averias/internet/adsl/accesorios/adaptadores_USB_inalambricos/USB_g_Senao/USB_g_Senao.htm?path=%3Ca%20href%3D%27http%253A%252F%252Fwww.movistar.es%252Fon%252Fio%252Fes%252Fatencion%252Fsoporte_tecnico_y_averias%252Finternet%252Fadsl%252Faccesorios_adsl.htm%27%20class%3D%27texto3_4%27%3EAccesorios%20inal%E1mbricos%20ADSL%20%26gt%3B%20%3C/a%3E Telefonica drivers]
[http://lampiweb.com/foro/index.php?topic=5938.0 internals (incorrectly labeled as a SparkLAN WL-682)]
*[[Senao NOA-3570]]: 2x Senao NL-3054MP PLUS :(Intersil ISL3880+ISL3686A) Mini PCI cards
